nodes.bodyText: @harshbafna Can you please explain what was the reason for adding these JVM OPTS values?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -28,16 +44,16 @@ APP_NAME="Gradle"
 APP_BASE_NAME=`basename "$0"`
 
 # Add default JVM options here. You can also use JAVA_OPTS and GRADLE_OPTS to pass JVM options to this script.
-DEFAULT_JVM_OPTS=""
+DEFAULT_JVM_OPTS='"-Xmx64m" "-Xms64m"'

nodes.bodyText:
This file has been updated by gradle wrapper command, the official tool for upgrading gradle, and has been checked in as is.
The script updates the following files :

gradlew
gradlew.bat
gradle-wrapper.properties (updates the distribution URL)
gradle-wrapper.jar
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -28,16 +44,16 @@ APP_NAME="Gradle"
 APP_BASE_NAME=`basename "$0"`
 
 # Add default JVM options here. You can also use JAVA_OPTS and GRADLE_OPTS to pass JVM options to this script.
-DEFAULT_JVM_OPTS=""
+DEFAULT_JVM_OPTS='"-Xmx64m" "-Xms64m"'
